mapper.select: select a.`id`, a.`gateway_id`, a.`name`, a.`serial_num`, a.`last_link_time`, a.`enable`,a.`remove`, a.`create_time`, a.`update_time`, b.`uuid`,b.`name` as gatewayName,b.`address`,b.`source`, c.`id` as productId,c.`name` as productName from iot_client a left join iot_gateway b on b.id = a.gateway_id left join iot_product_type c on c.id = a.product_id where a.`gateway_id` = #{gatewayId}
